rules_text: For each permanent type among permanents target player controls, gain control of target permanent that player controls of that type until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]As As'han stood above his former tormentors, now humiliated and contrite, he knew he had taken the first step on a lifelong calling.[/i]
special_text2: [-7]: For each permanent target player controls, As'han deals 3 damage to that player unless they sacrifice that permanent. For each card in their hand, As'han deals 3 damage to them unless they discard a card.
